data.persona: Lord Zuric is my name. I am Keldon Warlord of Dominara. I am your doom, mortal!
data.description:
You are in the tower spire.
A large spire at the tower top. It overlooks the city, maybe the tallest structure. You cans see it all from up here, all directions, all four of them.
The hog is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to raise the hog and throw it down the tower
data.mid_motivation: I want to spread fear and confusion among the people of the city
data.long_motivation: I wish to put them in disarray and uncertainty so that they will not be ready for battle when we attack

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drop hog down the tower spire

timeline.action: hit and kill people at random to create chaos
